title: Polarity assessment of hydroxide mediated P(VDF-TrFE) composites for piezoelectric energy harvesting and self-powered mechanosensing
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01118J, Paper
Abhishek Sasmal, Payel Maiti, Arunachalakasi Arockiarajan, Shrabanee Sen
The polarity of P(VDF-TrFE) has been found to increase initially and then decrease abruptly after addition of a small amount of ZnSn(OH)6 which has been mainly attributed to excessive and strong hydrogen bonding interaction.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
